1: -module(oleg_engine_epgsql_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    6: 
    7: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
    8: %% Function: suite() -> Info
    9: %% Info = [tuple()]
   10: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   11: suite() ->
   12:   [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   13: 
   14: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   15: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   16: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   17: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   18: %% Reason = term()
   19: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   20: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   21:   Config.
   22: 
   23: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   24: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> term() | {save_config,Config1}
   25: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   28:   ok.
   29: 
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   32: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   33: %% GroupName = atom()
   34: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   35: %% Reason = term()
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   38:   Config.
   39: 
   40: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   41: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   42: %%               term() | {save_config,Config1}
   43: %% GroupName = atom()
   44: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   47:   ok.
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   51: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   52: %% TestCase = atom()
   53: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   54: %% Reason = term()
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   57:   Config.
   58: 
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   61: %%               term() | {save_config,Config1} | {fail,Reason}
   62: %% TestCase = atom()
   63: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   64: %% Reason = term()
   65: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   67:   ok.
   68: 
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
   71: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
   72: %% GroupName = atom()
   73: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
   74: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   75: %% TestCase = atom()
   76: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
   77: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
   78: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
   79: %% N = integer() | forever
   80: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   81: groups() ->
   82:   [].
   83: 
   84: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   85: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
   86: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   87: %% GroupName = atom()
   88: %% TestCase = atom()
   89: %% Reason = term()
   90: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91: all() ->
   92:   [my_test_case].
   93: 
   94: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   95: %% Function: TestCase() -> Info
   96: %% Info = [tuple()]
   97: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   98: my_test_case() ->
   99:   [].
  100: 
  101: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  102: %% Function: TestCase(Config0) ->
  103: %%               ok | exit() | {skip,Reason} | {comment,Comment} |
  104: %%               {save_config,Config1} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  105: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  106: %% Reason = term()
  107: %% Comment = term()
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: my_test_case(_Config) ->
  110:   ok.
